content.SAM_PARAGRAPH1: Hi, my name is Samantha, a Cosmetic Nurse Injector and Founder of Antidote — a Melbourne-based cosmetic clinic that aim to make patients feel empowered by helping them feel fresh despite everyday stress and restoring the healthy glow and natural radiance that they once had.
content.SAM_PARAGRAPH2: I have been a Division 1 Registered Nurse in Australia since 2010, with wealth of experience in Medical-surgical, Anaesthetics and Post-Anaesthesia Care Unit.
content.SAM_PARAGRAPH3: Having always been passionate about aesthetics, skin health and the natural ageing process, I decided to pursue a career in Cosmetic Medicine in 2017 and eventually, started my passion project— Antidote.
content.SAM_PARAGRAPH4: As an Aesthetic Nurse, I am a natural results advocate. I firmly believe that one’s natural features should only be emphasized, and not drastically altered. I have an eye for detail and believe that the tiniest tweaks make the biggest impact. Imagine how you look after a relaxing holiday. That’s my goal for you every single day- to look fresh and rested.
content.HOME_PARAGRAPH1: Antidote is a cosmetic clinic that advocates for natural results. This is for patients who want to achieve that fresh and rested look like they just came from a relaxing holiday.
content.HOME_PARAGRAPH2: To achieve this, Antidote uses subtle yet effective approach to non-surgical cosmetic treatments that has been meticulously planned after doing an individualised assessment and consultation.
content.HONESTY: We have our patients best interest at heart. We don’t oversell in order to gain more profit and we guarantee fair pricing.
content.SAFETY: Our non-surgical cosmetic treatments are done with careful attention to detail. Patients’ health and safety remain our top priority.
content.NATURAL_RESULTS: Subtlety is key. We aim to enhance your beauty whilst maintaining a natural look, leaving your friends wondering what’s your secret to achieving that youthful glow.
content.COMPETENCE: Proficient in providing medical cosmetic treatments including Botulinum Toxin and Dermal Fillers. Our treatments are delivered according to best practice principles.
